title: A Hundred Thousand Updates per Second with MarkLogic
abstract: With a relatively small cluster of commodity servers with old fashioned spinning disks it is possible to achieve over 100,000 updates per second with MarkLogic. In this talk we will explore tuning techniques and configurations used to reach this throughput. While you might not be able to use all of these tricks on your next project, even one or two of them can make a big difference. We will also explore tuning techniques used to implement a challenging workload involving real-time aggregate calculations saved back into the database. Similar throughput results were achieved.
